Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Lifestyle | Travel
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 65 Minutes
Premiere: January 07, 2013

What Happens in Kavos... is a documentary series which follows different young thrill-seeking Brits in Kavos, Corfu. The cameras manage to get a glimpse of what really goes on in this hedonistic party resort, away from their parents.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33851)
